title: Restore example of conditional logic in expressions
author: Scotchester
details: Added a YAML example demonstrating conditional environment variable assignment using `&&` and `||` operators
Included explanatory text clarifying the logic: sets `MY_ENV_VAR` to `value_for_main_branch` on `main` branch, else `value_for_other_branches`
Emphasized requirement for truthy value after `&&` operator to avoid fallthrough to `||` case
